beads.name: Rock Crystal
beads.description: Rock Crystal is a powerful stone that can help you to amplify your energy and intentions. It is a master healer that can help you to focus your energy and intentions on what you want to manifest in your life. It can also help you to clear negative energy and bring in positive energy. Rock Crystal is a great stone to use when you are feeling overwhelmed or stressed, as it can help you to calm your mind and focus on what is important. It is also a great stone to use when you are feeling stuck or blocked, as it can help you to break through any obstacles that are holding you back.
